name: brazil_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetches the Brazil Songs chart information for a given date and range.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart data, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of chart data to retrieve.
